original_text: And all who went out of the gate of his city listened to Hamor and his son Shechem, and every male was circumcised, all who went out of the gate of his city.
korean_text: 성문으로 출입하는 모든 자가 하몰과 그의 아들 세겜의 말을 듣고 성문으로 출입하는 그 모든 남자가 할례를 받으니라

sentences.original_text: And all who went out of the gate of his city
listened to Hamor and his son Shechem
sentences.korean_translation: 하몰과 그의 아들 세겜의 말을 들었고

sentences.original_text: all who went out of the gate of his city
